Description: The length of the statement  "		var actor = system.ActorOf (Props.Create (() => new EchoService (new IPEndPoint (IPAddress.Any' port)))' "echo-service"); " is 121.

The following statement contains a magic number: using (var system = ActorSystem.Create ("echo-server-system")) {  	var port = 9001;  	var actor = system.ActorOf (Props.Create (() => new EchoService (new IPEndPoint (IPAddress.Any' port)))' "echo-service");  	/**                  *  Now you should be able to connect with current TCP actor using i.e. telnet command:                  *  $> telnet 127.0.0.1 9001                  */Console.WriteLine ("TCP server is listening on *:{0}"' port);  	Console.WriteLine ("ENTER to exit...");  	Console.ReadLine ();  }
